title: Me, Him and You
overview: "That encounter surely changed my life." Takumi, who aspires to become a chef, has no place to live when the restaurant where he was working as a live-in chef went out of business. He was looking for a new job, but was rejected. Then, he is surprised to find a certain person in a coffee shop he entered. Inside the store were Ryoji, a photographer; Daiya, a model; and Soichiro - Daiya's uncle. Takumi recalls his past love at first sight for Ryoji and the words he said to him at that time.... "How do you want to live?" Ryoji does not remember at all, and Takumi has been living his life hiding the fact that he loves men. Ryoji and Daiya, who are friends, try to share a room, but due to cost issues, they are looking for another tenant. Daiya, who has a good sense of humor, welcomes Takumi, whom he has never met before, as the third member of the group. Takumi, who unexpectedly ends up living with the person he loves, Ryoji, who is not serious about love, and Daiya, who seems to be living a carefree life. What is the happy future that the three will face?
